ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You are not in control of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You are not a warden over them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and are not invested with the authority to compel them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You do not have full control over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You are not at all a guardian over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You are not a Musaytir over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: You are not a watcher over them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: thou art not charged to oversee them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thou art not at all a warder over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thou art not over them a warden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and not a taskmaster over them—
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thou art not one to manage (men's) affairs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You are not a dictator over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You are not charged to oversee them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You have no control over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You are not over them a controller.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:22] you are not a taskmaster over them (a variant reading [for musaytir] has musaytir, that is to say, [not one who has been] given authority over them) — this was [revealed] before the command to struggle [against the disbelievers].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thou art not) Muhammad (at all a warder over them) you are not imposed on them such that you force them to accept faith.
